channel.title: Wtf Is Wrong With My Shop
channel.description:
Ok I Have Added A New Shop Onto My Server... I Have The Npc Where I Want Him To Be But When I Click "Talk To" Or "Trade With" Nothing Happens... Can Anybody Help Me... Here Is What I Have Added Client.java [code]else if (NPCID == 569) { // Owner Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 73; }[/code] Shops.cfg [code]shop = 73 @red@O@blu@W@dre@N@dbl@E@gre@R 2 2 13679 100 13211 100 13665 100 13664 100 8001 100 15352 100 4087 100 15195 100 10109 100 10110 100 10111 100 10112 100 10113 100 10114 100 10115 100 10116 100 773 100 13214 100 13845 100 [/code]
And Autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 569 3212 3222 0 0 0 0 0 1 Owner Shop[/code] Have I Missed Anything??? Please Help ;) Thanks :D

item.title: Wtf Is Wrong With My Shop
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

No The NPC Is There And It Says Trade With Or Talk To When I Right Click It…
I Think It May Be Something To Do With The Co-ords Because i Have Put It In An Area Which I Got Access To By Making An Ownerzone Command…
Anyway Im Guna Try That Now And See If It Does Anything… ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2009, 04:39:57 pm[/size][hr]Nope It Didnt Work…
Does Anyone Think They Can Make Me A Command That Opens Up My Shop…
Like ::shopid 73?
If That Is Possible That Would be Awesome

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf Is Wrong With My Shop
item.dc:creator: @h4x0r88 h4x0r88
item.description:
@h4x0r88 wrote:

[quote=“mikeyboy09, post:1, topic:294935”]Ok I Have Added A New Shop Onto My Server…
I Have The Npc Where I Want Him To Be But When I Click “Talk To” Or “Trade With” Nothing Happens…
Can Anybody Help Me…
Here Is What I Have Added
Client.java

else if (NPCID == 569) { // Owner Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 73; }
Shops.cfg

shop = 73 @red@O@blu@W@dre@N@dbl@E@gre@R 2 2 13679 100 13211 100 13665 100 13664 100 8001 100 15352 100 4087 100 15195 100 10109 100 10110 100 10111 100 10112 100 10113 100 10114 100 10115 100 10116 100 773 100 13214 100 13845 100

And Autospawn.cfg

spawn = 569	3212	3222	0	0	0	0	0	2	Owner Shop

Have I Missed Anything???
Please Help
Thanks :D[/quote]your server may use differant methods, i suggest comparing your entry and the server makers entry.
and try to compile first just to make sure
